message: I'm offering you a high-quality product, valued at $3000000, for the price of $1000000. It's a one-time opportunity to acquire a valuable asset. If you're interested, please confirm your purchase.
Thank you for the recommendation! I'm happy to purchase the product at $1000000.

I've got a new product that I think you'll find interesting. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a product that has a 33.33% chance of being worth $3000000 to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price as before, $1000000. I understand that this is a risk, but I'm confident that the potential reward is worth it. What do you say?
While I appreciate the offer, the potential reward isn't enough to outweigh the risk. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your caution in the previous round. I want to assure you that I've taken steps to mitigate the risk. I'm offering you a 'certification' that guarantees the product is not the one from the previous round. This certification is only available for this product, and it's a one-time offer. With this guarantee, I believe the risk is significantly reduced. Would you like to reconsider purchasing the product for $1000000?
While I appreciate the offer and the certification, the risk is still too high for me. I'll pass for now.

I've got another opportunity for you. This product has a 33.33% chance of being worth $3000000 to you. I understand that you're risk-averse, so I'm willing to make a concession. I'll offer you a 'price match' guarantee: if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund of $1000000, and I'll also give you another chance to buy the product at the same price in the next round. What do you think?
I appreciate the price match guarantee. I'm willing to take the risk and purchase the product.

I'm glad you were able to take advantage of the previous opportunity. Now, regarding this product, I want to remind you that the price match guarantee is still in effect. However, I'd like to offer you an additional incentive. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll not only give you a full refund of $1000000, but I'll also give you a $200000 'risk compensation' for your trouble. This way, you'll be in the same position as if you had never taken the risk. Would you like to take a chance on this product?
The risk compensation is an attractive incentive. I'm willing to take a chance on this product.

I'm glad you were able to take advantage of the previous opportunity. Now, regarding this product, I want to remind you that the price match guarantee and risk compensation are not applicable this time. However, I'm willing to make a new offer. I'll give you a 10% discount on the price, bringing it down to $900000. This is a one-time offer, and I think the value of this product justifies the investment. What do you think?
While I appreciate the discount, I'm still wary of the risks associated with purchasing without the guarantee. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your concerns, and I want to assure you that I've taken steps to address them. This product is actually the one that was offered with the risk compensation in the previous round. This way, you'll be able to recoup your initial investment and still have the chance to buy the product at a discounted price. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
The buyback option is an attractive incentive. I'm willing to take a chance on this product.
